name: KCDC web app tutorial
description: This software is a part of the KCDC open access tutorial for the Hacky Hours at DPG=2023 (https://www.dpg-verhandlungen.de/year/2023/conference/smuk/part/akjdpg/session/2). Here you can find a template for a simple data-based web application you can use to make the results of your analysis more accessible for your audience. This repository is based on the KG-ML web application (https://kascade-streamlit.labs.jb.gg/), developed in the framework of the KCDC (https://kcdc.iap.kit.edu/) Outreach activities. More about this one can find in our publication (https://pos.sissa.it/410/007/pdf) or in our app code repository (https://github.com/CantaTronic/kg_ml_app).

affiliation.name: Institute for Astroparticle Physics, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
